data.name: F2183 White
data.descr:
• Tenkeyless 87 keys mechanical switches (MX Chery blue equivalent)
• Full transparent keycap for ultimate lighting
• Translucent backbone for better RGB effect
• Tri-mode : wired, 2.4Ghz and Bluetooth
• Hot-swappable: easy to customize
• 2000 mAh large-capacity lithium battery
• RGB backlighting effect
